categories: Category:Events during the New Republic Era

nodes.text: Assault on the Imperial Gozanti freighter

The Assault on the Imperial Gozanti freighter was a Mandalorian resistance operation around 9 ABY. Four Mandalorians led by Bo-Katan Kryze went on a mission to steal weapons from an Imperial Gozanti-class cruiser which flew for a remnant of the Galactic Empire led by Moff Gideon.
The mission appeared in "Chapter 11: The Heiress" of Jon Favreau's 2019 Disney+ television series The Mandalorian, directed by Bryce Dallas Howard and released on November 13, 2020.
